ai_response: Hello there! It's good to see you. What can I do for you today?

transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: Today, we discussed the new project timeline and assigned tasks to each team member.

transcript.speaker: ai
transcript.text: What are the main milestones for the project?

transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: The main milestones include the initial design phase, development, testing, and final deployment.

transcript.speaker: ai
transcript.text: Can you elaborate on the initial design phase?

transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: The initial design phase involves creating wireframes, gathering requirements, and setting up project documentation.

transcript.speaker: ai
transcript.text: What are the key requirements you have identified?

transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: Let's discuss the marketing strategy for our new product.

transcript.speaker: ai
transcript.text: Sure, what are your initial thoughts on the target audience?

transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: We are targeting tech-savvy young professionals who are early adopters of new technology.

transcript.speaker: ai
transcript.text: What channels do you think will be most effective in reaching them?

transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: Social media platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram will be key, along with tech blogs and influencer partnerships.
